Articles.Content:
Hi all. So, I have the Docking Port Alignment Indicator mod installed from ckan (1.0.4) yet there is no button to activate it? I am currently in a paused game 237.3m away from where I want to dock, however when I click on the port i want to dock with I only have the option to change its name?

One thing to note though, when I fire up KSP I get an incompatible toolbar warning even though its apparently up to date in ckan's eyes?

Any help please?

EDIT:

Never mind.....I hadnt enabled it from the toolbar icon.....my bad ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-22T18:41:44Z" title="07/22/2015 06:41  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 22, 2015</time> by maceemiller**
